short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI assistant that analyses your screen to make your workflow easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyborg is an intelligent extension that helps users navigate and perform complex tasks on their computer by providing interactive visual instructions. By taking screenshots of the user interface, Cyborg analyzes the screen in real time and displays pop-ups indicating exactly where to click or what to do. Thanks to this intuitive approach, Cyborg simplifies processes and increases efficiency, whether for repetitive actions or more technical tasks.
